# idsec_sia_workspaces_db (Data Source)

SIA Workspaces DB data source, reads DB information and metadata, based on the id of the database.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_sia_workspaces_db" "example_db" {
  id = var.database_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `certificate` (String) Certificate id used for this database that resides in the certificates service
- `configured_auth_method_type` (String) The target configured auth method type
- `enable_certificate_validation` (Boolean) Whether to enable and enforce certificate validation
- `id` (String) Database id to get
- `name` (String) Database name to get
- `platform` (String) Platform of the database, as in, where it resides
- `port` (Number) Port of the database, if not given, the default one will be used
- `provider_engine` (String) Provider engine, will be later deduced to the identifier of the provider
- `provider_family` (String) Family of the database provider
- `read_only_endpoint` (String) Optionally, a read only endpoint of the database
- `read_write_endpoint` (String) Read write endpoint of the database
- `secret_id` (String) Secret identifier stored in the secret service related to this database
- `services` (List of String) Services related to the database, most commonly used with oracle/sql-server
